## gist delete

Deletes gists by ID.

### Synopsis

Deletes gists by ID.

Expects at least one ID. If multiple are present, deletes all specified gists.

```
gist delete ID... [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for delete
```

```
      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.config/gist/config.yaml)
```
